bibl.author: Walt Whitman
bibl.title: Walt Whitman to Hannah Whitman Heyde, December 22, 1890
bibl.orgName: The Charles E. Feinberg Collection of the Papers of Walt Whitman, 1839–1919, Library of Congress, Washington, D.C.

body.p: Merry Christmas to you first thing, from my heart and soul—Nothing very new with me—fine sunny to-day, (just after noon) and I want to get out if possible in wheel chair—Send you enclosed 10—you might give one of the 5s to C—havn'thaven't heard any thing further f'mfrom Jessie f'mfrom Saint Louis since—Y'rsyours recdreceived—Love to you, sister dear—& God bless you—Y'rYour affectionate brother
